document.full_text: poor countries bordering libya, ivory coast and somalia have taken in hundreds of thousands of people fleeing conflicts, a refreshing attitude in a world often marked by xenophobia, the u.n. refugee boss said on tuesday.
document.title: unhcr praises open borders for libyans, ivorians
lines_and_colors: poor countries bordering libya, ivory coast and somalia have taken in hundreds of thousands of people fleeing conflicts, a refreshing attitude in a world often marked by xenophobia, the u.n. refugee boss said on tuesday.
